net.proteusframework.internet.servlet.auth

Class RoleImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.internet.servlet.auth.RoleImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Role

    public class RoleImpl
extends Object
implements Role
    Defines a role. This class may be subclassed to override the isAuthorizationValid(String, String) method for applications of authfilter where the user secret is not available in plaintext. When this is done, only Basic Authentication is supported.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

      • isAuthorizationValid

        public boolean isAuthorizationValid(String authorizationName,
                           String authorizationSecret)
        Description copied from interface: Role
        Check if the authorization information is valid for this role. If the authorization name is not defined in this role then false is returned. If the role has no user secrets then this method always returns false.

        This method may also be overridden to have different behavior to allow use of authfilter when the plaintext user secret is not available.

        Specified by:
        isAuthorizationValid in interface Role
        Parameters:
        authorizationName - The authorization name.
        authorizationSecret - The authorization secret.
        Returns:
        true if the authorization name is defined in this role and the secret matches.

      • isIPValid

        public boolean isIPValid(String ipAddress)
        Description copied from interface: Role
        Check if the IP address matches one of the IP patterns. If there are no IP patterns defined this method always returns false.
        Specified by:
        isIPValid in interface Role
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - The IP address.
        Returns:
        true if the IP address matches one of the patterns.
